name: LouchGame Demo
description:
The LouchGame Demo is finally here! 

Ram into living popsicles, get high off shrooms, and defy the laws of time in a silly adventure jam packed with cartoon sound effects. Find hidden secrets in strange places that you wouldn't normally look. A whole cast of strange enemies awaits for you to murder see around the 3 available levels in the demo. Also, there's a dance party filled with dancers submitted by the community to gawk at!

This is what BogusGame and the Stupid Idea Test became after all this time. Essentially, BogusGame was a joke project for two friends back in 9th grade. Then, it later became Stupid Idea after I had an idea to make an open world platformer (open world never made it as you can see), which later became LouchGame after it spiraled into being my main project!

(The game isn't done yet, so things can change from now until release!)

Here are some links related to the game:

LouchGame Discord Server: https://discord.gg/vSdD8eFEvZ

The OST Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMPYO-YjwlNK7pct2uCx2HpUFvEjNafIv

The Game's Trello Board: https://trello.com/b/vcGczCIU/louchgame-trello
